function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of facial recognition and tracking technologies for crowd detection","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, potential misuse of data","Mitigation":"Implement strict regulations and privacy policies, transparent use of data","Technologies":"Blockchain for data security, encryption, anonymization","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Reliance on smart technologies to control virus transmission","Impact":"Overreliance on technology, failure to address root causes","Mitigation":"Balanced approach with medical and non-pharmaceutical solutions, public education","Technologies":"AI for predictive modeling, IoT for data collection","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"City administrations, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Non-pharmaceutical measures as a substitute for medical solutions","Impact":"Underestimation of the importance of medical solutions, potential spread of infection","Mitigation":"Promote both non-pharmaceutical and medical solutions, invest in vaccine research and development","Technologies":"Biotechnology for vaccine development, data analytics for tracking virus mutations","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
